data.reasoning: Senza Gluten explicitly states its mission is to be a 100% gluten-free Italian restaurant and claims to have rigorous safety policies in place. The review analysis found safety indicators relating to being 'gluten-free' which suggests customers perceive this. The lack of warning indicators further supports this. The menu doesn't contain obvious gluten-containing items. While a rule-based detector scored risk at 13.6/100, the overall evidence suggests a high level of safety, especially given the restaurant's explicit dedication to a gluten-free environment and policies.
